q: "I am paying shyster rates," Sergio Marchionne said, noting that Chrysler had no choice in 2009 but to pay the high interest rates the government set as part of its$ 15 billion Chrysler bailout. We had no choice... I am going to pay the shyster loans. He called the loans "a thorn in my side." Sergio Marchionne even manages to get his insult wrong. "Shyster" refers to attorneys, not lenders. Among the candidates Mike Pence helped was Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana. Jackie Walorski said Mike Pence can appeal to both social and economic conservatives. I know he feels pulled because there is a great campaign to recruit him at the federal level, she said. "I'm going to be excited whatever door he picks." If Mike Pence does decide to run for president, he'll likely have to start working quickly to raise campaign money.

Donald Rumsfeld Hillary Clinton has rightly called for an "orderly transition" to bring about a "democratic, participatory government" without directly calling for Hosni Mubarak 's ouster. Yet as Heritage Foundation analyst Jimmy Carter Phillips recently noted, the Barack Obama Administration should be careful not to empower anti-democratic forces such as the Islamist Muslim Brotherhood.[ 47] By prodding the regime to hold genuinely free and fair elections and by linking U.S. aid to this process, the U.S. can help to usher in a more democratic government in Egypt.
